prod_short_desc: Load the freshly cut logs with the awesome Forest Tractor!
prod_long_desc:
Work in nature with the LEGO® City Forest Tractor, featuring a moving arm with opening claw and massive wheels, plus a small log stand, 2 chains, 2 buildable logs, small pine tree, chainsaw and a shovel. This cool toy for kids includes a minifigure.
Includes a forest worker minifigure.
Features a Forest Tractor with massive wheels and arm with an opening claw, 2 chains, plus a small buildable log stand.
Pick up the logs with the tractor claw to move them around.
Cut the logs to the right length in the stand with the chainsaw.
Accessory elements include a chainsaw, shovel, small pine tree and 2 buildable logs.
This cool toy for kids is suitable for ages 5-12.
Forest Tractor measures over 3” high, 7” long and 3” wide.
Log stand measures over 1” wide and under 1” high and 1” long.
Logs each measure over 1” long and under 1” high and 1” long.
Pine tree measures over 1” high and under 1” wide and 1” long.
As seen in the LEGO® City Vehicles TV commercial.
